text.section: A licensed physician and a licensed pharmacist who wish to enter into therapy management contracts shall have a physician-pharmacist agreement.

section.section: A licensed physician who has entered into a physician-pharmacist agreement shall submit to the Board of Physicians a copy of the physician-pharmacist agreement and any subsequent modifications made to the physician-pharmacist agreement or the protocols specified in the physician-pharmacist agreement.

A licensed pharmacist who has entered into a physician-pharmacist agreement shall submit to the Board of Pharmacy a copy of the physician-pharmacist agreement and any subsequent modifications made to the physician-pharmacist agreement or the protocols specified in the physician-pharmacist agreement.
